rint-page-wallets-accounts-addresses-des: It's worth understanding the differences between some key terms.
rint-page-wallets-accounts-rint-addresse: An Rint account has an address (wallet address), like an inbox has an email address. You can use this to send funds to an account.
rint-page-wallets-alt: Illustration of a robot with a vault for a body, representing an Rint wallet
rint-page-wallets-rint-account: An Rint account is an entity that can send transactions and has a balance.
rint-page-wallets-bookmarking-desc: If you use a web wallet, bookmark the site to protect yourself against phishing scams.
rint-page-wallets-cd: Physical hardware wallets that let you keep your crypto offline – very secure
rint-page-wallets-converted-desc: If you’re looking to hold some serious value, we recommend a hardware wallet as these are the most secure. Or a wallet with fraud alerts and withdrawal limits.
rint-page-wallets-curious-desc: If you’re new to crypto and just want to get a feel for it, we recommend somrnting that will give you the opportunity to explore Rint applications or buy your first RNT directly from the wallet.
rint-page-wallets-desc-2: You need a wallet to send funds and manage your RNT.
rint-page-wallets-desc-3: Your wallet is only a tool for managing your crypto account. That means you can swap wallet providers at any time. Many wallets also let you manage several accounts from one application.
rint-page-wallets-desc-4: That's because wallets don't have custody of your funds, you do. They're just a tool for managing what's really yours.
rint-page-wallets-description: Rint wallets are applications that let you interact with your crypto account. Think of it like an internet banking app – without the bank. Your wallet lets you read your balance, send transactions and connect to applications.
rint-page-wallets-desktop: Desktop applications if you prefer to manage your funds via macOS, Windows or Linux
rint-page-wallets-rint-wallet: A wallet is a product that lets you manage your crypto account. It allows you to view your account balance, send transactions, and more.
rint-page-wallets-features-desc: We can help you choose your wallet based on the features you care about.
rint-page-wallets-features-title: Prefer to choose based on features?
rint-page-wallets-get-some-alt: An illustration of a hand creating an RNT logo made of lego bricks
rint-page-wallets-get-some-desc: RNT is the native crypto of Rint Network. You’ll need some RNT in your wallet to use Rint applications.
rint-page-wallets-get-wallet-desc: There are lots of different wallets to choose from. We want to help you choose the best one for you.
rint-page-wallets-get-wallet-desc-2: Remember: this decision isn’t forever – your Rint account is not tied to your wallet provider.
rint-page-wallets-how-to-store: How to store digital assets on Rint
rint-page-wallets-keys-to-safety: The keys to keeping your crypto safe
rint-page-wallets-manage-funds: An app for managing your funds
rint-page-wallets-manage-funds-desc: Your wallet shows your balances, transaction history and gives you a way to send/receive funds. Some wallets may offer more.
rint-page-wallets-meta-description: What you need to know to use Rint wallets.
rint-page-wallets-mobile: Mobile applications that make your funds accessible from anywhere
rint-page-wallets-most-wallets: Most wallet products will let you generate an account. So you don't need one before you download a wallet.
rint-page-wallets-seed-phrase-desc: Wallets will often give you a seed phrase that you must write down somewhere safe. This is the only way you’ll be able to recover your wallet.
rint-page-wallets-seed-phrase-snippet: there aeroplane rint vent formation doge possible network distinct under spirit lamp
rint-page-wallets-seed-phrase-write-down: Don’t store it on a computer. Write it down and keep it safe.
rint-page-wallets-slogan: The key to your digital future
rint-page-wallets-stay-safe-desc: Wallets require a bit of a different mindset when it comes to safety. Financial freedom and the ability to access and use funds anywhere comes with a bit of responsibility – there’s no customer support in crypto.
rint-page-wallets-subtitle: Wallets give access to your funds and Rint applications. Only you should have access to your wallet.
rint-page-wallets-take-responsibility: Take responsibility for your own funds
rint-page-wallets-take-responsibility-de: Centralized exchanges will link your wallet to a username and password that you can recover in a traditional way. Just remember you’re trusting that exchange with custody over your funds. If that company is attacked or folds, your funds are at risk.
rint-page-wallets-triple-check-desc: Remember transactions can’t be reversed and wallets can’t be easily recovered so take precautions and always be careful.
rint-page-wallets-try-dapps-alt: An illustration of Rint Network community members working togrnter
rint-page-wallets-try-dapps-desc: Dapps are applications built on Binance Smart Chain. They’re cheaper, fairer and kinder on your data than most traditional applications.
rint-page-wallets-web-browser: Web wallets that let you interact with your account via a web browser
rint-page-wallets-your-rint-account-desc: Your wallet is your window into your Rint account – your balance, transaction history and more. But you can swap wallet providers at any time.
rint-page-wallets-your-login-desc: Your wallet lets you connect to any decentralized application using your Rint account. It's like a login you can use across many dapps.
